about_the_game:
The main feature of Sandrail Race is that you can move freely throughout the landscape without limitations of bounded paths. This allows that in each race, you can choose whether to tackle an obstacle or take a detour to avoid it, whether slopes, potholes, dunes, jumps, etc ..., so you can experience in each race what route gives you better results. The only obligation is not to skip any waypoint-checkpoint of the race.

WITH SANDRAIL RACE YOU WILL ENJOY MORE, AND YOU WILL BE ABLE TO IMMERSE YOURSELF BETTER IN THE GAME THANKS TO ALL THESE FEATURES:

  • ARTICULATED SUSPENSIONS: Shafts, shock absorbers, suspension wishbones, and other mechanisms are visible and move during gameplay just like in reality with every jump.

  • CONFIGURABLE AND VISIBLE MECHANICS: With super detailed 3D models, configure live exhausts, carburetors, shock absorbers, wheels, paint, and vinyls.

  • SUPER REALISTIC 3D LANDSCAPES: Deserts, dunes, giant dunes, ravines, craters, etc...

  • GAMEPAD WITH VIBRATION: If vibration is available, your gamepad will vibrate differently to reflect every suspension jump, bump, drift, and speed.

  • ROLLERS: All wheels leave ruts on their way through the sand.

  • REALISTIC BEHAVIORS: The vehicles have natural behaviors, skidding, throwing sand and dust from the wheels, skidding, jumping, and overturning.

  • ENVOLVING AND REALISTIC SOUND: Thanks to the surround sound, you will feel your power, speed, and where other vehicles are nearby.

All this with high quality 3D graphics, sound, and handling !!!!

With the hope that you will spend many hours of excitement and enjoyment, in this indie game, we have paid great attention to the graphic aspect of the cars and landscapes, the cinematic transmissions, the handling and behavior of the vehicles, and the vibration of the gamepad, to transmit to the player all the sensations of freedom, fun, and simplicity of these powerful and fun vehicles called Sandrail made exclusively to reach high speeds through the sand thanks to its lightness and powerful engines.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home x64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: The game can be configured for VGAs with specifications lower than the recommended requirements, reducing the graphic effects, but the game will be less fast and less spectacular (proportionally to the hardware used)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64, or Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11700F @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB, or similar VGA, or higher VGA
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 7.1 compatible sound card, or 7.1 gaming headset
  • Additional Notes: Xbox gamepad with vibration

short_description: Enjoy the dune jumps and the feeling of freedom and adrenaline of the Sandrail type vehicles built exclusively to reach high speeds on the sand. Find your route through the desert, without being limited by the margins of a track or road and decide your best route to be number one.
